msbt.message: , my dear, do you happen to recall a certain plan we had to get together at your house? I mean, DO you?! I stood outside calling to you FOREVER, but apparently you weren't home. I was worried something had happened to you, my dear.
, I know I said that I would come over for a visit but something has come up. I'm so sorry. I do hope you'll accept a rain check so we can try again some other day.

I'm so very sorry that I forgot about the plans we had made!Something urgent came up, and I just couldn't get away.If you can find it in your heart to forgive me, I would love to try again some other time.
